planet.description: This planet was discovered by Ballard et al. 2011. The discovery was made with a space based telescope (0.95 m Kepler Telescope). The parameters listed here are those reported by Malavolta et al. 2017 and were imported into the Open Exoplanet Catalogue from the NASA Exoplanet Archive.
